inclusion.criterion: beat) or anembryonic pregnancy (empty gestational sac larger than 20 mm)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: missed abortion with CRL (crown ump length) no larger than 8 weeks of pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: women who got a clear explanation about all treatment options and they chose misoprostol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: women who read and signed an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known allergy to prostaglandins or NSAIDS
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: heavy vaginal bleeding and hemodynamic instability
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: women with a clotting problems or treated with anticoagulant medications
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: missed abortion with CRL larger than 8 weeks of pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: diseases that can be aggravated by prostaglandins : severe asthma, uncontrolled blood pressure, glaucoma, sickle cell anemia, mitral stenosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of RRMS and is currently under treatment. She smokes 10 cigarettes per day and drinks alcohol occasionally.
